long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PMG Disha Student Exam is a Chrome extension designed to enhance the user experience on the PMG Disha platform. It seamlessly integrates with the PMG Disha website, providing additional functionalities to streamline various processes for both training centers and students.

Key Features:

Enhanced Login Page:

The extension improves the login experience on the PMG Disha website, offering a more user-friendly interface and added functionalities.
Training Center Profile:

Tailored scripts are injected when accessing the training center profile, optimizing the interaction and providing a smoother navigation experience.
Student Profile and Dashboard:

The extension enhances the student profile and dashboard pages, ensuring a seamless and efficient browsing experience for users.
Language Selection:

Language selection scripts enable users to easily switch between languages on the PMG Disha platform, accommodating a diverse user base.
Invigilator and Authentication:

Specialized scripts are provided for invigilator-related pages, as well as for capturing fingerprints and candidate authentication processes.
This extension aims to improve the overall usability and functionality of the PMG Disha platform, contributing to a more efficient and user-friendly environment for both training centers and students
